title: Purchase of a Chiller for the Central Air Conditioning System of the  Superior Courts Complex Building
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. (Mrs.) Thalatha Atukorala, Minister of Justice & Prison Reforms, to purchase a new chiller for the Central Air Conditioning System installed in the  Superior Courts Complex, with a view to enhancing the air conditioning facilities of the building in which the judicial activities of the Superior Court and the Court of Appeal are being carried out, was approved by the Cabinet.
